actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Antonio Zamora-Mendoza, his wife, Josefina Padilla Zamora, and their sons, Alberto Antonio Zamora-Padilla, Victor Zamora, Leopoldo Zamora, Jaime Zamora, and Jose Zamora.

summary.text: Declares seven individuals lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Antonio Zamora-Mendoza, his wife, Josefina Padilla Zamora, and their sons, Alberto Antonio Zamora-Padilla, Victor Zamora, Leopoldo Zamora, Jaime Zamora, and Jose Zamora.
